CULKk15.First Lines:
QVen the koke in the northe halows his nestAnd buskes his birdys
                    and buirnys to sleeþan shall fortune…
CULKk15.Last Lines:
…Wyght a wykede womane woo mytht sho beeScho has closede him
                    in a gragge of cornwales coste
